happy_paths.name: Successful Onboarding & First Deposit
steps: Customer expresses interest in a leveraged account, often by clicking 'Hablar con un Agente'.
Agent explains the product, rules (10% drawdown), benefits, and provides a standard information package.
Customer asks clarifying questions about rules, minimum deposit amounts, and withdrawal conditions.
Agent guides the customer through the registration and document verification process.
Agent explains deposit methods (PSE, Card, Crypto) and their respective processing times.
Agent guides the customer to use the 'Amplify' feature on the platform to multiply their capital by x12.
Agent provides MT5 server details (e.g., TMFINANCIALS) and instructions to link the newly created account.
Customer confirms their account is set up, linked to MT5, and ready to trade.

happy_paths.name: Successful Information Request
steps: Customer inquires about the leveraged accounts.
Agent provides detailed information about the product.
Customer asks clarifying questions about rules, withdrawals, and company details.
Customer is satisfied with the information and expresses intent to proceed at a later time.

happy_paths.name: Successful Withdrawal Process
steps: Customer makes a profit and asks how to withdraw funds.
Agent explains the process: transfer funds from the MT5 account to the main platform wallet via the 'Amplify' section.
Agent provides a link to a detailed withdrawal guide.
Customer transfers profits, adds their crypto wallet address, and initiates the withdrawal.
Withdrawal is processed and received in the customer's crypto wallet.

deviations.name: Off-Topic, Spam, or Wrong Number
deviations.description: The conversation is non-productive as the user has contacted the business by mistake, is sending spam/abusive messages, or the initial message contains no meaningful input.
deviations.trigger: Initial messages are 'null' or 'undefined', contain spam links, are personal messages indicating a wrong number (e.g., 'Fari', 'Q mas perro'), or agent responds with 'Estas equivocado'.

deviations.name: Inexperienced User / Unsuitable for Product
deviations.description: The customer reveals they have little or no trading experience. The agent identifies that the leveraged account is for experienced users and pivots the conversation to offer educational resources or an academy.
deviations.trigger: Customer explicitly states they are new or have no experience (e.g., 'No tengo experiencia', 'Quiero aprender', 'do you provide signals?', 'who will help me trade?').

deviations.name: Post-Setup Trading Platform Issues
deviations.description: After successfully setting up their account, the customer is unable to place trades on MT5, has issues with the platform interface, or has questions about specifics like server names or asset tickers. The most common issue is needing to add a '.f' suffix to asset symbols.
deviations.trigger: Customer reports errors like 'trade is disabled', 'invalid volume', 'no me deja operar', 'no me aparece el servidor', or asks why asset tickers need a '.f' suffix.

deviations.name: Login & Registration Issues
deviations.description: Customer is unable to register, complete document verification (KYC), or log in to the client portal, often due to incorrect passwords, verification errors, or platform bugs.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'No me deja entrar', 'error al registrarme', 'my password isn't working', or sends a screenshot of a login error.

deviations.name: Deposit Failures & Complications
deviations.description: Customer's attempt to deposit funds fails or does not reflect in their wallet. This is often due to card rejections, high processing fees that deter the user, or difficulties with the crypto deposit process.
deviations.trigger: Customer reports a failed transaction, questions high commission fees, expresses confusion about crypto wallets, or states their deposit was rejected (e.g., 'No me deja depositar', 'me cobran 30 dólares de comisión').

deviations.name: Withdrawal Delays & Escalations
deviations.description: An existing customer reports that a withdrawal has been processed on their end but is not reflecting in their crypto wallet after the expected timeframe. The agent's role is to reassure and direct the customer to official support channels.
deviations.trigger: Customer states 'hice el retiro y no ha cargado', 'aún no se ve reflejado el saldo en la wallet', or asks 'where is my withdrawal?'.

deviations.name: Bonus Account Confusion
deviations.description: The customer inquires about a 'free account' or 'bonus account' they saw in an advertisement, often believing it requires no initial deposit. The agent must clarify that the bonus account is a gift contingent on purchasing a real leveraged account.
deviations.trigger: Customer asks to claim their 'cuenta grátis' or 'bono sin depósito'.
